name: “True” by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [Digital drawing created with my phone.] Belief does not require TRUTH. We can believe based on false or inaccurate information. TRUTH, however, is objective and exists whether we believe it or not. (Not sorry.) Humans are limited. Fools, however, are non-Euclidean, and often taste of cotton candy! ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
